text: São Vicente Ferrer is a Brazilian municipality in the state of Pernambuco. According with IBGE in 2009, has an estimated population of 17,333 inhabitants. It has a total area of . ==Geography== * State - Pernambuco * Region - Agreste of Pernambuco * Boundaries - Macaparana (N), Machados (S) Vicência (E); Orobó and Paraiba state (W). * Area - 110.49 km2 * Elevation - 419 m * Hydrography - Goiana River * Vegetation - Subcaducifólia forest * Annual average temperature - 23.1 °C * Distance to Recife - 131 km ==Economy== The main economic activities in São Vicente Ferrer are related with commerce and agribusiness, especially creations of cattle; and plantations of bananas, grapes and sugarcane. ===Economic Indicators=== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- !
